title: Wraith card
data:
{{version028}}
{{flavour|The card depicts absolutely nothing.}}
The Wraith card will inflict heavy [[draining]] on the player. This is reduced by any levels of [[negative energy resistance]], and negated entirely by full resistance (rN+++).
